Articles.Content:
I am an old member and , sadly, my account did not survive the Great Account Purge

Anyway, i had not recreated right after (KSP had been collecting dust in an old folder) but when .20 came out, i decided i would get back to the forums.

So i guess that's it.
Well it is good to see you back on the forums! Same thing happened to me. Do not be afraid to ask questions and post suggestions in their corrects forum location. Have fun and enjoy!
